content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the capability to set reminders or interact with your personal calendar. I exist solely as a text-based conversational AI, so I don't have access to your digital devices or calendars.

But I can suggest a few options to help you remember your tennis game with Jack:

1. **Digital calendar**: Open your digital calendar (e.g., Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook) and create a new event for this Thursday with a reminder to play tennis with Jack.
2. **Phone reminder**: Set a reminder on your phone using a built-in reminder app or a third-party app like Any.do or Todoist.
3. **Paper planner**: If you prefer a more analog approach, write down the reminder in a paper planner or on a sticky note.
4. **Ask a virtual assistant**: If you have a virtual assistant like Siri, Google Assistant, or Alexa, you can ask them to remind you about your tennis game with Jack this Thursday.

Choose the method that works best for you, and make sure to set the reminder so you don't forget your tennis game!
